title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values for the parameters are not displayed in the value boxes.
EB: I expect that the default values for the parameters should be shown in the value boxes so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Preview a report. 
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
